title: The Newsletter of September 17th, 2015 is Now Online!
content:
We have selected what we consider to be the most interesting news of the week amongst the industry hot topics. We’ve chosen within all the news published on our website since last week. All of the automotive industry’s sectors are represented in our newsletter so there is something for everyone. You can read the latest version of our newsletter by clicking here. You can also subscribe to our newsletter by clicking here.

Enjoy the rea…
